title: Freehale 10MG Tab 1x14 (L)
details:

Most of the

precautions: Before using this medicine, if you are suffering from any kind of allergic reaction, then first you should consult with your doctor because some of the inactive ingredients which are used in the manufacturing of this medicine can cause some extremely hazardous suffect, especially on your skin in terms of skin allergy.Talk to your doctor and consult about pre-existing diseases because some of the pre-existing diseases might ultimately lead to world lever and mental problems, which can be disastrous, especially in the long run.
effects: There is no doubt about the fact that using this medicine can cause some serious side effects. So, it is always advised to use this medicine according to the prescription of the doctors. Some of the  serios Freehale tablet side effects are given below:Mostly people suffer from pain in their arms and legs, so if you suffer from these types of side effects, directly contact to your doctor.The tightening and numbness in muscles are also known as some of the serious side effects of using this medicine. People also suffer from swelling and weakness in major muscles.One of the rarest symptoms of using this drug is an allergic reaction. If you notice any kind of skin allergic reaction, then you should directly consult to your doctor. As the itching of the skin can be very disastrous in the long run.

title: Montika 10MG Tab 2x7 (L)
details:
Montika tablets are used for asthma patients and belong to anti-leukotriene class of drugs. This class of drugs treats against leukotriene receptors hence named ‘antagonist drugs’. They are used by asthma patients to prevent an asthma attack. The

READ MORE
precautions: Never forget to read all the necessary precautions before taking medicine. Consult a doctor first and take medicine according to his/her advice. Following are the essential montika tablet precautions.Brief your doctor if you are allergic to montelukast, the active ingredient of montika tablets or to any other inactive ingredients of the medicine.The medication is not suitable for acute asthma attacks.Do not use any corticosteroid along with or in place of montika tablet as it leads to severe side effects.Take medicine with caution if you have any psychiatric disorders.Do not take medicine and consult a doctor if you are a phenylketonuria patient.Consult a doctor if you are allergic to aspirin prior taking medicine.If you are a liver patient, it is advisable to take medicine only on the doctor's recommendation.Briefly tell your doctor about the medication you are already using, including the antibiotics or anti-epileptic medication. As it can react with other drugs and cause severe allergies.If you are pregnant, consult a doctor first prior to taking medicine.If you are breastfeeding, take the medication only on the doctor's recommendation.Brief your doctor about any allergies you have before taking medicine.Children should not be given the medication without a doctor's advice.Keep the medicine away from children.Do not use expired medicine. Always look at the expiry date before taking medicine.Place the medicine in a dry and cool place.Tell your doctor/Pharmacist your medical history of, Liver disease, Anxiety, Depression, Thoughts of suicide. During pregnancy, this medication should be used only when clearly needed. This medication passes into breast milk. Consult your doctor before breast-feeding.
effects: The plausible montika tablets side effects are described below. It is not mandatory that you will experience all of them. If you experience severe and prolonged side effects, seek a doctor immediately. Diarrhea.Fever.Cough.Flu or runny noseHeadache.Possible lungs infection.Ear infection or pain.Inflamed nasal cavities.Sinus problems.Sore throat.Stomach upset.Stomach pain.Anaphylaxis.Fatigue and restlessness.Chest tightness.Some of the side effects related to mental disorders reported are depression, anxiety, suicidal thoughts, hallucinations, insomnia, and aggressive behaviour. If you experience other extreme side effects, stop the medication and rush to the doctor.Serious side effects includes, Numbness/Tingling/Shooting pain in the arms or legs, Sinus pain/Swelling, Muscle weakness, Uncontrolled muscle movements, Stuttering or Allergic reactions.

title: Myteka 10MG Tab 1x14 (L)
details:
Myteka tablet (Montelukast sodium) is a prescribed medicine that helps to block the substances which may lead to asthma or any allergic reactions in the eyes or on any other part of the body. It belongs to the medical class of leukotriene recepto

READ MORE
precautions: When you are consulting your doctor to take Myteka tablets, discuss your past medical history, including the following situations.If you have any type of sensitivity to aspirinHaving mental or physical disordersabnormal buildup in your immune system or your bodyIf you do not discuss the above situations and you are suffering from them. Then by taking this, medicine can result in further significant and severe side effects.Check the ingredients used in this medicine before using it. If you have any problem with its ingredients like allergy or something else, discuss it with your doctor. He will prescribe you an alternative medicine and will upgrade the record regarding this condition.Avoid taking Myteka along with steroids. Otherwise, it can increase white blood cells known as eosinophils. For people having asthma, that will cause severe problems.The people who are suffering from asthma, the use of this medicine can change the vessel walls, known as vasculitis. Myteka tablets can also cause inflammation of blood vessel walls.If you have taken alcohol with Myteka tablets, then immediately consult with your doctor.
effects: Myteka tablets can cause side effects. Some of them are mentioned below one by one.Some of Myteka side effects are in common, for example.HeadacheLiver problemPain in eyes and blurred visionPain in earsIndigestion, cardialgia, and aciditySome side effects of Myteka are severe. Some of them are listed below.Joint disease, i.e., pains in the jointsDifficulty in eating, for example, swallowing.Dyspepsia i.e. pains in stomachSome of the side effects are very rare, i.e., they rarely occur. For example Churg Strauss syndromeInfluenzaPyuria

title: Montiget 10MG Tab 2x7 (L)
details:
Montiget tablet is available as a generic medicine and belongs to the leukotriene receptors antagonists’ class of medicines. It is known as a generic drug and brand name drug.

Availability

Montiget tablet's availability in Pakistan

READ MORE
precautions: Montiget tablet precautions are described.Before taking this medication, inform the doctor about your past and current medical history. Also, inform the doctor if you are taking any supplements.Inform the doctor if you are allergic to any of the ingredients used in the Montiget tablet. Otherwise, by taking this medication, you may notice severe allergic reactions.The use of the Montiget tablet should not be used as an alternative to treat the symptoms of inhaled.People suffering from mental health problems avoid its use, as it raises mental health problems.Montiget tablet should not be prescribed or taken if there is a sudden asthma attack.It should also avoided be for the treatment of status asthmaticus. Status asthmaticus is a severe asthma attack condition.This medication creates problems related to the immune systems. So, the patients suffering from already immune system problems inform the doctor about it.Montiget tablet in pregnancy is considered safe as it is unharmful for the fetus. However, consult the doctor before taking it.Also, Montiget for breastfeeding mothers is unharmful. But to avoid any serious side effects, before taking it to inform the doctor and follow the suggestion prescribed by him.All of the Montiget tablets precautions may not be described above.
effects: Montiget tablet's side effects are the followings.The common side effect of Montiget tablet is headache, nausea, fever, stuffy and runny nose.It may cause stomach upset and stomach pain. It can cause diarrhoea.Montiget tablet can cause tooth pain and tremors.It can also cause heartburn, tiredness, and hoarseness.Montiget tablet creates confusion and agitation in the patients taking this medication. It also leads to suicidal thoughts, actions, and aggressive behaviour.It also causes cough and sore throat.It can cause skin rashes and other allergic reactions.It can cause mental health problems, such as depression, anxiety, etc.You may feel trouble in sleeping, irritability, and vivid dreams.Maybe all of the Montiget tablet side effects are not described above. But, if any of the side effects persist for a longer time, then seek medical help.

title: Curosurf 1.5ML Inj 1x1 (P)
details: A natural surfactant for endotracheal administration is indicated in the prevention and treatment of respiratory distress syndrome in premature infants.
precautions: Acute Changes In Oxygenation And Lung Compliance. Transient adverse reactions associated with administration of CUROSURF include bradycardia, hypotension, endotracheal tube blockage, and oxygen desaturation. These events require stopping CUROSURF administration and taking appropriate measures to alleviate the condition. After the patient is stable, dosing may proceed with appropriate monitoring.
effects: Transient adverse effects seen with the administration of CUROSURF included bradycardia, hypotension, endotracheal tube blockage, and oxygen desaturation. The rates of the most common serious complications associated with prematurity and RDS observed
